duties_responsibilities.duty: Verify all coin deposits received for processing and ensure the deposits match the depositing customer’s amount declared on the coin deposit ticket.
Operate a jet scan to sort coin by denomination and to verify customer coin deposits.
Compare coin bags received against manifest to ensure all deposits are accounted for.
Enter verified coin into the tracking system and report deposit totals to the supervisor and customer.
Clean and maintain all coin equipment and ensure the processing area is clean and clutter free.
Sort and load coin on a cart or pallet by bank, and conduct safety and security checks.
